name: SellFixedAsset
description:
Initiate the sale of a specified fixed asset.

Use this tool to sell a specific fixed asset by providing its asset ID. It should be called when confirming or completing the sale process of a fixed asset in Zoho Books.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization within Zoho Books.

parameters.name: fixed_asset_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the fixed asset to be sold.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the fixed asset.

parameters.name: asset_sale_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the asset sale, including expense account ID, invoice ID, line item ID, and reason for selling.

expense_account_id.description: Enter the account id to track the expenses associated with the asset’s depreciation.The available account types are Expense and Other Expense

invoice_id.description: Enter the invoice id associated with selling the fixed asset.

line_item_id.description: Enter the line item id that is associated with the fixed asset account.

reason.description: Enter the reason for selling the fixed asset

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: fixed_asset_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the fixed asset.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the fixed asset.

expense_account_id.description: Enter the account id to track the expenses associated with the asset’s depreciation.The available account types are Expense and Other Expense

invoice_id.description: Enter the invoice id associated with selling the fixed asset.

line_item_id.description: Enter the line item id that is associated with the fixed asset account.

reason.description: Enter the reason for selling the fixed asset

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
